properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Fernandina Beach to St. Augustine FL out 20 NM; Coastal waters from St. Augustine to Flagler Beach FL out 20 NM; Coastal waters from Altamaha Sound to Fernandina Beach FL out 20 NM
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 21 at 3:47AM EST until January 22 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Jacksonville FL
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, north winds 20 to 30 kt with
gusts up to 40 kt and seas 6 to 11 feet expected. For the
Small Craft Advisory, north winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to
35 kt and seas 5 to 7 feet.

* WHERE...Southeast Georgia and Northeast Florida coastal waters
from Altamaha Sound GA to Flagler Beach FL out to 20 NM.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 2 PM this afternoon to 4 PM
EST Wednesday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 2 PM EST
this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 PM EST WEDNESDAY
